prompt:
Summarize the following resume in 100 words or less:
Vivek Ranjan
Email: vivekranjanorbit@gmail.com — Phone: +91-9804540625
LinkedIn Profile
Professional Summary
Results-driven Software Test Engineer / QA Analyst with over 6 years of experience in
automationtestingforweb and mobile applications.
Expertise in test case design, execution, defect tracking, and automationusing
Selenium with Java. Strong background in Agile methodologies, team management, and application
support. Adept at working with tools like JIRA, Rally, Oracle SQL, Postman, and Perfecto.
Core Competencies
• Functional, Regression, UAT, and Automation Testing
• Mobile Testing (iOS and Android) using Perfecto
• API Testing using Postman
• Test Automation (Selenium WebDriver, Java, TestNG)
• Agile Methodologies (Scrum, Kanban)
• Test Case Writing, Execution, and Bug Reporting
• Backend Testing (Oracle SQL, SoapUI)
• SDLC and STLC Processes
• CI/CD Integration and Performance Testing
Technical Skills
• Test Management Tools: JIRA, Agile Centre, BMC Remedy
• Automation Tools: Selenium WebDriver, TestNG
• Database: Oracle SQL
• Programming Languages: Core Java, HTML
• API Testing: Postman, SoapUI
• SDLC Models: Waterfall, Agile
• Other Tools: Perfecto, UIPath (RPA)
Work Experience
Capgemini Pvt. Ltd., Bangalore Nov 2021 – Present
Consultant - Quality Analyst
• Automated and executed test cases using Selenium Webdriver and Java. Efficient in creating X-
path, identifying web elements based on locators. Executing test scripts in Web applications.
Experience in Hybrid framework. Analyzed and tested banking and capital market applications.
• Performed functional, regression, and performance testing across UAT, PROD, and NON-
PROD environments.
1• Conducted E2E application testing, including QR code testing for mobile applications (iOS and
Android).
• Performed API testing using Postman, verifying request-response handling.
• Led test case design, execution, and bug reporting, ensuring high-quality deliverables.
• Collaborated with technical and functional teams
completion: This resume belongs to a candidate with [insert summary based on content, e.g., 5 years of software engineering experience, skilled in Python and Java].
